headline: Two papers accepted to [CHI 2020](https://chi2020.acm.org/)
Presenting my dissertation research at [Ajou University](https://media.ajou.ac.kr/)
Serving as a program committee for [CHI 2020](https://chi2020.acm.org/)
Serving as a program committee for [CSCW 2020](http://cscw.acm.org/2020/)

[Dr. Robert Krueger](https://kruegert.github.io/) will present our recent paper [Facetto](assets/files/publications/journal/facetto-combining-unsupervised-and-supervised-learning-for-hierarchical-phenotype-analysis-in-multi-channel-image-data/paper.pdf) at IEEE VIS
Serving as a program committee for [IUI 2020](https://iui.acm.org/2020/)
Serving as a program committee for [PacificVis 2020](https://iui.acm.org/2020/)
Teaching the first [visualization course](https://bcviscourse.github.io/) at Boston College
Starting a new faculty position at [Boston College](https://www.bc.edu/bc-web/schools/mcas/departments/computer-science.html)

Sharing job materials: [CV](assets/files/materials/CV_2018.pdf), [Cover Letter](assets/files/materials/CoverLetter.pdf), [Research Statement](assets/files/materials/Research_Statement.pdf), [Teaching Statement](assets/files/materials/Teaching_Statement.pdf), [Diversity Statement](assets/files/materials/Diversity_Statement.pdf).
Presenting [DataSelfie](https://dataselfie.namwkim.org/) at [CHI 2019](https://chi2019.acm.org)
Presenting [DataToon](https://datatoon.github.io/) at [CHI 2019](https://chi2019.acm.org)
Successfully defended my [dissertation](https://www.namwkim.org/assets/files/publications/thesis/from-exploration-to-explanation-designing-for-visual-data-storytelling/paper.pdf)!
Presenting [Story Curves](https://storycurve.namwkim.org) at [Boston Area Digital Scholarship Symposium](https://harvard-dssg.github.io/boston-area-dss/)
Special Recognition for Outstanding Review, CHI 2019
Presenting my dissertation research at KAIST
Two papers conditionally accepted to [CHI 2019](https://chi2019.acm.org).
Named as one of 2019 [Siebel Scholars](https://www.seas.harvard.edu/news/2017/10/five-computer-science-graduate-students-named-2018-siebel-scholars).
Presented [BubbleView](https://bubbleview.namwkim.org/) with Zoya at [CHI 2018](https://chi2018.acm.org/).
Led two coding labs in [CS 179](http://sp18.cs179.org/course-timeline/) at Harvard.
Gave a [mini-course](http://www.namwkim.org/datavis/2018/) on visualization as part of January @ GSAS at Harvard.
Received [Rising Star BRONZE](https://www.informationisbeautifulawards.com/news/259-winners-2017) in Kantar Information is Beautiful Awards.

[Data-Driven Guides](https://www.informationisbeautifulawards.com/showcase/2575-data-driven-guides-supporting-expressive-design-for-information-graphics) shortlisted in Kantar Information is Beautiful Awards 2017.
Presented [Story Curves](https://storycurve.namwkim.org) at IEEE VIS 2017.
Presented [Story Curves](https://storycurve.namwkim.org) at Walt Disney Imagineering.
Internship in the [EPIC group](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/group/epic/) at Microsoft Research.
Invited talk at Pegasystem, Inc. on visualization for communication.
Invited talk at MIT Graphics talk series on visualization for communication.
